name: Break Pile
description:
Welcome to Pile Up.

Break the color block and stack the white block.
Brick breaker style arcade game. One solo ball vs the stack of blocks.

Aim of the game/Features:
- Hit the colour block to defeat the block and collect the block
- Use power ups to complete the level
- Every block is breakable, some requires continues hit to destroy the block
- Collect paddles
- Rank up in Game Center
- Haptic Feedback
- Progressive Levels
- More than 100 levels to play
- 10 challenging mini levels
